imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract geometric hero background with warm neutrals and subtle grain (hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
- Minimal app mark/logo: simple monogram inside a rounded shape, neutral palette (app-mark.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Provide a clean initial landing page that confirms the project is set up and ready for feature development, including: app name/title, short tagline, and a simple primary call-to-action button (no specific feature behavior required yet).
Create and apply a cohesive visual theme for the UI (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across the landing page. Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Add the generated static images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them on the landing page (e.g., hero background and app mark).

projectName: Initialize new app baseline with themed landing page
